review: I have been using the Amazon fire stick for a relatively short time, but so far I really enjoy it. It was very easy to set up and is very easy to use. The one app I wish they had was the HBO Go app, but I've read that it will be available soon.
author: Gina

review: We have had the Fire TV Stick for about a month now and I love it.  It was easy to plug into the TV and it has been working wonderfully.  The only problem we had was that it needed to be rebutted at one point.  I am hoping that does not continue to happen.  We are now looking at getting another one.
author: Wendy Franz

review: So simple to set up and use! Great application for watching TV Shows, movies, and playing games...especially if you are an Amazon Prime member!
author: Nolan

review: Simple to setup exceeding my expectations for easy of use and content.
author: Turtle

review: Almost perfect except no volume for tv. Hopeit updates new shows.
author: Phillip Scott chandler
